skill.s1.name: Blessing of Compassion
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} DEF[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to the main target and [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} DEF[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]Ice DMG[/b][/color] to all other targets, with a [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#00adff][b][i]Freeze[/i][/b][/color] to the main target

If Cherish is in [color=#efe183][b][Justice Oath][/b][/color], additionally increases the main target's DMG Taken by ([color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color] for every [color=#00adff][b]600 DEF[/b][/color] Cherish has), up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns
skill.s2.name: Honour Protection
skill.s2.description: Gives 1 ally 1 stack of [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} DEF[/b][/color] + [color=#00adff][b]650 Shield[/b][/color] as [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color], then increases their [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] equal to [color=#00adff][b]20%[/b][/color] own [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] (Up to {skill_data}) for 2 turns
When gaining this effect, increases that ally's chance of attacked by [color=#00adff][b]50%[/b][/color] if their HP is above [color=#00adff][b]60%[/b][/color]
At the start of Cherish's next turn, gives that ally 1 stack of [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color].
If Cherish is in [color=#efe183][b][Justice Oath][/b][/color], increases the Shield from [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]25%[/b][/color].
skill.s3.name: Prayer of Spirituality
skill.s3.description: Gives all allies 1 stack of [color=#00adff][b]12% DEF[/b][/color] + [color=#00adff][b]120/240/360[/b][/color] (At level 1, 50, 70) [color=#00adff][b]Shield[/b][/color] as [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color] and 1 stack of [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} DEF[/b][/color] + [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} Shield[/b][/color] as [color=#5de5f7][b][Holy Protection][/b][/color], gives all allies 1 Down Gauge and increases their DMG Bonus by [color=#00adff][b]1%[/b][/color] (for every [color=#00adff][b]300 DEF[/b][/color] Cherish has, up to [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) for 2 turns.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Immediately gives all allies 1 stack of [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} DEF[/b][/color] + [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data} Shield[/b][/color] as [color=#5de5f7][b][Holy Protection][/b][/color], decreases all allies' DMG Taken by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.p1.name: Sacrifice
skill.p1.description: Allies Shielded by Cherish have their [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] increased by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.p2.name: Humility
skill.p2.description: Allies Shielded by Cherish has their [color=#00adff][b]Effect RES[/b][/color] increased by [color=#00adff][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: I Will Be Kind to the Strong
awareness.a0.description: At the start of battle, gives all allies 1 stack of [color=#00adff][b]12% DEF[/b][/color] [color=#00adff][b]+120/240/360[/b][/color] (At level 1, 50, 70) [color=#00adff][b]Shield[/b][/color] as [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color].

Gains 1 [color=#fec882][b][Valour][/b][/color] when allies with [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color] are attacked (up to 2 [color=#fec882][b][Valour][/b][/color] can be gained from this per turn).

At the start of Cherish's turn, consume 4 [color=#fec882][b][Valour][/b][/color] if Cherish has 4 and gain [color=#efe183][b][Justice Oath][/b][/color], and give all allies [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color].
awareness.a1.name: I Will Be Brave Against the Strong
awareness.a1.description: At the start of battle, gains 3 [color=#fec882][b][Valour][/b][/color], decreases the [color=#fec882][b][Valour][/b][/color] needed to gain [color=#efe183][b][Justice Oath][/b][/color] to 3.
awareness.a2.name: I Will Fight All Who Do Wrong
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s1][color=#7874d0][b][u][Blessing of Compassion][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s3][color=#7874d0][b][u][Prayer of Spirituality][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: I Will Fight For Those Who Cannot Fight
awareness.a3.description: Each stack of [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color] gives [color=#00adff][b]15%[/b][/color] more [color=#00adff][b]DEF[/b][/color] (Count up to 2 stacks)
When [color=#d6c9e0][b][Upright Mark][/b][/color] expires, restore [color=#00adff][b]20%[/b][/color] remaining [color=#00adff][b]Shield[/b][/color] as [color=#00adff][b]HP[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: I Will Help My Brother Knight
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s2][color=#7874d0][b][u][Honour Protection][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#7874d0][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#00adff][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#00adff][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: I Will Be True to My Friends
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#7874d0][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Increases all allies' [color=#00adff][b]Shield Received[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]30%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
awareness.a6.name: I Will Be Faithful in Love
awareness.a6.description: When gaining [color=#efe183][b][Justice Oath][/b][/color], additionally gain [color=#a7a3f6][b][Justice Judgement][/b][/color] for 2 turns.
When [color=#a7a3f6][b][Justice Judgement][/b][/color] is active, increase all allies' [color=#00adff][b]CRIT Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#00adff][b]15%[/b][/color].
